title: Chinese Hackers Breach Asian Telecom, Remain Undetected for Over 4 Years
description: A major telecommunications company located in Asia was allegedly breached by Chinese state-sponsored hackers who spent over four years inside its systems, according to a new report from incident response firm Sygnia.
